## Goal

The goal of the ITSMe package is to provide easy to use functions to quickly 
obtain structural metrics from individual tree point clouds and their respective 
TreeQSMs obtained with TreeQSM (https://github.com/InverseTampere/TreeQSM).

## Installation

You can install the development version of ITSMe from 
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lmterryn/ITSMe")
```
